Class EfsActivator.Builder

java.lang.Object
org.efs.activator.EfsActivator.Builder
Enclosing class:
EfsActivator
public static final class EfsActivator.Builder extends Object
Builder class used to create an activator. This builder guarantees correct arguments are passed to the workflow stage constructor.

An EfsActivator.Builder instance is obtained by calling EfsActivator.builder().

Author:
Charles W. Rapp
